original_text: was pleased to reveal his Son to me, in order that I might preach him among the Gentiles, I did not immediately consult with anyone;
korean_text: 그의 아들을 이방에 전하기 위하여 그를 내 속에 나타내시기를 기뻐하셨을 때에 내가 곧 혈육과 의논하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: was pleased to reveal his Son to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 자기 아들을 내게 계시하기를 기뻐하셨으니

sentences.original_text: in order that I might preach him
I did not immediately consult with anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 즉시 어떤 사람과도 상의하지 아니하였고
